brief.brief: If selected (set to true), runs the script identified in the Initialization Expressions as $script.name.
Format Control runs the script you specify before displaying the form.

The Run Script functionality works with the Database Manager only, and not with applications like Incident Management, Service Desk, Configuration Management, Request Management, or Problem Management. There are separate facilities within those applications for running scripts.
